mechanics.condition: Target is a creature you can see within range (60 feet)
mechanics.outcome: Target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 7d8 + 30 necrotic damage. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage.

mechanics.condition: Target is a humanoid AND is reduced to 0 hit points by this spell's damage
mechanics.outcome: At the start of your next turn, the humanoid rises as a zombie. This zombie is permanently under your command and follows your verbal orders to the best of its ability.

description_text: You send negative energy coursing through a creature that you can see within range, causing it searing pain. The target must make a constitution saving throw. It takes 7d8 + 30 necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A humanoid killed by this spell rises at the start of your next turn as a zombie that is permanently under your command, following your verbal orders to the best of its ability.
